```{r}

 library(tidyverse)
 library(primer.data)
```

```{r}
set.seed(10)

x <- nhanes |> 
  filter(age >= 18) |> 
  select(height, sex) |> 
  drop_na() |> 
  slice_sample(n = 50, by = sex)
```



This topic is about the population, a survey between males and females, and their body, race, height etc. The data source is NHANES, and we want to answer the question of how do other variables affect height?
